name: Monorama
description:
*Featured by Apple in UK, France, Germany, Italy, and many more!*

Monorama is all about painting the entire board while making sure there are no duplicate numbers in each row and each column. Sounds a bit familiar? Well, maybe. One thing for sure, this is not your typical number puzzles.
- Paint the entire board with numbers by dragging existing numbered tiles across adjacent empty tiles, and make sure there are no duplicate numbers in each row and column.
- Over a hundred fun and challenging puzzles. Can you solve them all?
